mapper.select: SELECT /* ShareMapper.selectShareListByPage */ X.SHARE_NO, X.SHARE_NAME, X.SHARE_CONTENT, X.VERSION, X.MODIFY_ID, X.MODIFY_DATE, X.USER_NICK, X.RNUM FROM (SELECT SUB.* , ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT C.* ,U.USER_NICK FROM TSHAREBOARD C ,TUSER U WHERE C.MODIFY_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY C.SHARE_NO DESC) SUB) X WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{page} * 10 - 9 AND #{page} * 10

SELECT /* ShareMapper.selectShare */ SHARE_NO , SHARE_NAME , SHARE_CONTENT , VERSION , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE , U.USER_NICK FROM TSHAREBOARD SB,TUSER U WHERE SB.SHARE_NO = #{shareNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND SB.MODIFY_ID = U.USER_ID
SELECT /* ShareMapper.selectShare */ MAX(SHARE_NO) FROM TSHAREBOARD SB,TUSER U WHERE SB.INSERT_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT /* ShareMapper.selectShareHist */ SHARE_NO , SHARE_NAME , SHARE_CONTENT , VERSION , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE FROM TSHAREBOARD_HIST A WHERE A.SHARE_NO = #{shareNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND A.VERSION = #{version, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TSHAREBOARD /* ShareMapper.xml : insertShare */ (SHARE_NO ,SHARE_NAME ,SHARE_CONTENT ,VERSION ,INSERT_ID ,MODIFY_ID) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(SHARE_NO)+1 FROM TSHAREBOARD) ,#{shareName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{shareContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,1 ,UPPER(#{insertId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ,UPPER(#{modifyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

INSERT INTO TSHAREBOARD_HIST /* ShareMapper.xml : insertShareHist */ (SHARE_NO ,SHARE_NAME ,SHARE_CONTENT ,VERSION ,INSERT_ID ,MODIFY_ID) VALUES (#{shareNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,#{shareName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{shareContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,(SELECT MAX(VERSION) FROM TSHAREBOARD WHERE SHARE_NO = #{shareNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ,UPPER(#{modifyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ,UPPER(#{modifyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
